dmca.title: [EV1-C1446467O] Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN! [invoid.net]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Thursday, October 19, 2006 2:40 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1446467O] Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN! [invoid.net] Subject: [EV1-C1446467O] Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN! [invoid.net] ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN! [invoid.net] Added by system at Thursday, Oct 19 2006 06:35 pm X-MailFrom: bobnorris@neo.rr.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.110] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Oct 19 19:34:39 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 19 Oct 2006 19:33:48 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 19 Oct 2006 19:33:48 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from bobnorris@neo.rr.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GaiKa-0000eF-Kc for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 19 Oct 2006 19:33:48 -0500 Received: from ms-smtp-02.ohiordc.rr.com ([65.24.5.136]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bobnorris@neo.rr.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GaiKW-0002CO-6b for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 19 Oct 2006 19:33:44 -0500 Received: from housewares (cpe-24-209-42-174.neo.res.rr.com [24.209.42.174]) by ms-smtp-02.ohiordc.rr.com (8.13.6/8.13.6) with SMTP id k9K0Xeh6000383 for ; Thu, 19 Oct 2006 20:33:41 -0400 (EDT) Message-ID: <002401c6f3df$5cb10740$9500a8c0@housewares> From: "Joana" To: Subject: Hosting copyrighted material - TAKE IT DOWN! [invoid.net] Date: Thu, 19 Oct 2006 20:33:28 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0021_01C6F3BD.D55565F0" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869 X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 X-Virus-Scanned: Symantec AntiVirus Scan Engine Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of neo.rr.com designates 65.24.5.136 as permitted sender) client-ip=65.24.5.136; envelope-from=bobnorris@neo.rr.com; helo=ms-smtp-02.ohiordc.rr.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 20 Oct 2006 00:33:48.0659 (UTC) FILETIME=[68B50C30:01C6F3DF] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear sir, So that you will act to end copyright infringement of my work that is hosted on your web server. This is the web site in question: http://www.invoid.net/igloo/powerlevel/ (all those images have been copyrighted and must be taken down ASAP) #1. My name is Paul M. Lucas. That is my electronic signature for immediate purposes. A written signature will be additionally forwarded by postal mail once I receive mailing instructions if need be. I am the owner of the work in question, which I copyrighted with the US Library of Congress in February 2006. #2. The copyright protects my "Joana/Mancow's Leveling Guide For Horde" #3. This guide is text material detailing the routes and techniques I employ to achieve world record time to move my character (Troll Hunter for the Horde faction) from the start (level 1 in Durotar] to the end [level 60 in Winterspring] in the popular online game World of Warcraft. #4. My Address: Paul M. Lucas P.O. Box 542 Barberton, Ohio 44203-4311 United States My Email: bobnorris@neo.rr.com or pml@neo.rr.com #5. I am complaining of the electronic distribution of my proprietary work on your web server of which I did not give consent to or authorize in any manner. My work has been pirated and you are contributing to this illegality by allowing it continue unabated. #6. I swear the foregoing statements are true and that I, Paul M. Lucas, am the sole and proper owner of this now pirated guide. I ask that you take immediate action to stop the illegal distribution that you are now allowing of my copyrighted work. Sincerely, Paul M. Lucas. Oct, 19, 2006 For more information: Here is a copyright certificate scan: http://www.joanasworld.com/joana_guide_copyright.jpg And my homepage where I am selling it at: http://www.joanasworld.com/ MIME element (text/html)
Dear sir,
    
 
So that you will act to end copyright infringement of my work that is hosted on your web server.
 
This is the web site in question: 
http://www.invoid.net/igloo/powerlevel/  (all those images have been copyrighted and must be taken down ASAP)
 
#1. My name is Paul M. Lucas.  That is my electronic signature for immediate purposes.  A written signature will be additionally forwarded by postal mail once I receive mailing instructions if need be.  I am the owner of the work in question, which I copyrighted with the US Library of Congress in February 2006.
 
#2.  The copyright protects my "Joana/Mancow's Leveling Guide For Horde"
 
#3.  This guide is text material detailing the routes and techniques I employ to achieve world record time to move my character (Troll Hunter for the Horde faction) from the start (level 1 in Durotar] to the end [level 60 in Winterspring] in the popular online game World of Warcraft.
 
#4.   My Address:      Paul M. Lucas
          &nb sp;           &nb sp;         P.O. Box 542
            ;             ;         Barberton, Ohio 44203-4311
                                United States

          < BR> My Email:     bobnorris@neo.rr.com  or pml@neo.rr.com
 
#5.  I am complaining of the electronic distribution of my proprietary work on your web server of which I did not give consent to or authorize in any manner.  My work has been pirated and you are contributing to this illegality by allowing it continue unabated.
 
#6.  I swear the foregoing statements are true and that I, Paul M. Lucas, am the sole and proper owner of this now pirated guide.
 

      I ask that you take immediate action to stop the illegal distribution that you are now allowing of my copyrighted work.
 
      Sincerely, Paul M. Lucas.  Oct, 19, 2006
 

For more information:  Here is a copyright certificate scan:
http://www.joanasworld.com/joana_guide_copyright.jpg
 
And my homepage where I am selling it at:
http://www.joanasworld.com/
 
MIME element (text/plain)
